@EmeraldCow Hello Cheryl, our cabin baggage allowance entitles adults and children to one cabin bag weighing up to 7kg (maximum width 56cm, height 36cm and depth 23cm). 
If cabin baggage exceeds our maximum weight or dimension limits, guests will be asked to check bags in. *Yaz
